neisil9: Good day Chimamanda, My name is Ehi, I am a 500level pharmacy student from the University of Benin. I do not know if you would ever get the opportunity to see this, I do sincerely hope and pray you do. I write to you with a lot of questions, I read your "Americanah", "Half of a yellow sun", Speech on "We should all be feminist" and just finished your "Purple Hibiscus", It always feels magical because reading always bring back the same feelings I get reading Chinua achebe, it may even be deeper. It always opens me up to depths I never thought possible, however your endings always leaves me with insatiable cravings, its almost like I want to continue on the journey with these characters. I do have many unanswered questions with certain hypothetical cases, and if you would indulge briefly i would love to share my thoughts.
